description: It's a great pdf editor. Has powerful features. Offers paid pro version but free one is capable eveyday jobs. Highly recommended. Thank you so much for a great software.
When I tries to highlight the text horizontally and save the file it works but whenever we reopen the file all horizontally highlighted text become vertically highlighted.
Just my opinion, but working with it didn't go well - I was able to edit the PDF in LibreOffice, much much easier!
Stürzt extrem oft ab und verwirft dann alle vorgenommenen Veränderungen, sodass man von vorn starten kann. Komplett schlecht und nicht zu empfehlen, da unzuverlässige Software.
Se bloquea y obliga a reiniciar el equipo.
Bien mieux que la visionneuse classique, il n'y a pas de bugs lors de l'addition de commentaires à un PDF
